channel.title: Google chrome
channel.description:
So I have windows vista ultimate on my pc and I installed google chrome and everything backwards and the text for allot of pages including facebook are this " البريد الإلكتروني أو الهاتف كلمة السر
البقاء متّصلاً هل نسيت كلمة السر؟ "
Can anyone help me with this -_- its annoying as fuck

item.title: Google chrome
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Yeah but Google Chrome is still the same So I will just re-install it

:edit: I fixed it Google Translate is awesome, Thank you for your help guys

Read full topic

item.title: Google chrome
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

i had no idea browsers installed via the default machine installed language set but I guess it makes sense. you should be able to go to your language settings in control panel and change them

Read full topic

item.title: Google chrome
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Well i installed it with Vista in a different language i guess its in arabic “Egypt” -_- but if none of that works im going to reinstall google chrome

Read full topic

item.title: Google chrome
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95416?hl=en&ref_topic=1678461

should further help answer

Read full topic

item.title: Google chrome
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

go to the very right tab and if you go to like the third or fourth option from the bottom it should be settings it may be in a different language I don’t know. You should be able to click at the bottom of that gui to click on more settings. Try to find something about languages. You can also click google translate and try to translate those text figures to see what it’s saying

Read full topic
